mapper.select: select orderId, paymentKey, orderName, method, totalAmount, approvedAt, chargePoint, CancelReq, point.memberId, member.memberName from point inner join member on member.memberId = point.memberId where isMemberCheck = 1 and member.memberName like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select payNo, pointPay.memberId, payPoint, toMemberId, payDate, member.memberName from pointPay inner join member on member.memberId = pointPay.memberId where isMemberCheck = 1 and member.memberName like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
